ComicInfo.Title: Circus Maximus
ComicInfo.Summary:
Beverly is adjusting to married life with Dr. Bong, which she agreed to do in order to save Howard’s life, but when she comes to find out that Dr. Bong is still planning on killing Howard, all bets are off! Howard and Iris are ready to put a stop to the circus of crime- can they stop the thieving carnies?
With the Help of adventurer socialite Iris Raritan, Howard brings down the Ringmaster and His Circus of Crime.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-14 21:14:06. [CVDB18840]
ComicInfo.Characters: Beverly Switzler, Doctor Bong, Griffin (Franklin), Howard the Duck, Human Cannonball, Iris Raritan, Lee Switzler, Precious, Princess Python, Ringmaster
